Note:
A variant of 6588 occurring separately; cf. Tilley (1950)
XTilley, Morris Palmer. A Dictionary of the Proverbs in England in the 16th and 17th Centuries. Ann Arbor, MI: University of Michigan, 1950, A 316.
_description: On over-ambition — three proverbial monorhyming lines

BLHar3362.Transcription: He þat wyle furþer strecheþan hys schetyn wyl a rechein þe straw he chal hys feet feche
